name.value: Medication Process 9 3.0.0-beta - MedicationDispense - Serve - Scenario 10.x - target CheckContent - XML Format

description.value: Scenario 10.x - KWAL Medicatiegegevens MVE Script 10 (filterqueries pre-livegang kwalificatie)
Resource.id for MedicationDispense 1
Resource.id for MedicationDispense 2
Resource.id for MedicationDispense 3
KWAL Medicatiegegevens MVE Script 10 (filterqueries pre-livegang kwalificatie)
Test server to serve MedicationDispense resource(s) representing MP9 building block MedicationDispense
Confirm that the operation was successful
Confirm that the returned resource type is Bundle.
Confirm that the returned Bundle type is searchset.

Confirm that all returned resources contain an Resource.id except when temporary ids are used in the Bundle. The only time that a resource does not have an id is when it is being submitted to the server using a create operation: https://www.hl7.org/fhir/STU3/resource-definitions.html#Resource.id
Confirm that all returned resources except OperationOutcome and Binary contain a meta.profile tag.
Confirm that the fullUrl does not disagree with the id in the resource, see http://hl7.org/fhir/stu3/bundle-definitions.html#Bundle.entry.fullUrl
Confirm that the fullUrl is an absolute URL, an uuid or an oid.

expression.value: Bundle.entry.fullUrl.all( startsWith('http://') or startsWith('https://') or matches('^urn:oid:[0-2](\\.(0|[1-9]\\d*))*$') or matches('^urn:uuid:[A-Fa-f\\d]{8}-[A-Fa-f\\d]{4}-[A-Fa-f\\d]{4}-[A-Fa-f\\d]{4}-[A-Fa-f\\d]{12}$') )

description.value: Confirm that the returned Bundle conforms to the base FHIR specification and the resources to the stated profiles in the meta.profile tag.
Confirm that all Coding elements contain both a .system and a .code.
Confirm that the OID of the zib valueset is not used for the system of a coding element.

Confirm that all CodeableConcept elements contain either a coding.display or a text value if no Coding exists or has an extension (e.g. a nullFlavor or data-absent-reason extension). For more information see https://informatiestandaarden.nictiz.nl/wiki/FHIR:V1.0_FHIR_IG_STU3Use_of_coded_concepts.
Confirm that all References have a display value, see https://informatiestandaarden.nictiz.nl/wiki/FHIR:V1.0_FHIR_IG_STU3#Use_of_the_reference_datatype.

Confirm that all Identifiers have both a .system and a .value. In rare cases where a general category of identifiers can be used, .type can replace .system. Edge cases for both .system and .type to be unknown are not applicable to Nictiz. For more information, see https://www.hl7.org/fhir/stu3/datatypes.html#Identifier.
Confirm that the returned Bundle total value matches or is less than the number of entries in the Bundle. The included resources should not be counted as entries in the Bundle.total.
Confirm that the returned Bundle contains a self link.
Confirm that all returned resources except OperationOutcome and Binary contain a meta.profile tag.

Confirm that all returned resources contain an Resource.id except when temporary ids are used in the Bundle. The only time that a resource does not have an id is when it is being submitted to the server using a create operation: https://www.hl7.org/fhir/STU3/resource-definitions.html#Resource.id
Confirm that the fullUrl does not disagree with the id in the resource, see http://hl7.org/fhir/stu3/bundle-definitions.html#Bundle.entry.fullUrl
Confirm that the fullUrl is an absolute URL, an uuid or an oid.

expression.value: Bundle.entry.fullUrl.all( startsWith('http://') or startsWith('https://') or matches('^urn:oid:[0-2](\\.(0|[1-9]\\d*))*$') or matches('^urn:uuid:[A-Fa-f\\d]{8}-[A-Fa-f\\d]{4}-[A-Fa-f\\d]{4}-[A-Fa-f\\d]{4}-[A-Fa-f\\d]{12}$') )

description.value: Confirm that all References have a display value, see https://informatiestandaarden.nictiz.nl/wiki/MedMij:V2020.01/FHIR_IG#Use_of_the_reference_datatype.
Confirm that all CodeableConcept elements contain either a coding.display or a text value or has an extension (e.g. a nullFlavor or data-absent-reason extension).
Confirm that the returned searchset Bundle contains at least 3 MedicationDispense resource(s).
Confirm that the returned searchset Bundle contains at least 6 entries. (Consists of 3 MedicationDispense and 3 Medication resources.)
Check if the previous operation results in a FHIR MedicationDispense that contains the values that are expected following Nictiz' materials (fixture .id: mp-MedDsp-mp9-MBH300script10QA1MVE)
Response Bundle contains exactly 1 MedicationDispense with properties: contains a resource with identifier = MBH_300_script10_QA1_MVE
MedicationDispense resource evaluated in the previous assert contains an .id
Contains .meta with .profile 'http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/mp-MedicationDispense'
Contains .extension with url 'http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/ext-PharmaceuticalTreatment.Identifier' with .valueIdentifier with .system and .value

expression.value: Bundle.entry.resource.where($this is MedicationDispense).where(id = '${mp-MedDsp-mp9-MBH300script10QA1MVE-id}').extension('http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/ext-PharmaceuticalTreatment.Identifier').value.where($this is Identifier).where(system and value).exists()

description.value: Contains .identifier with .system and .value
Contains .status 'completed'
Contains .category with .coding with .system 'http://snomed.info/sct' and .code '373784005' and .display

expression.value: Bundle.entry.resource.where($this is MedicationDispense).where(id = '${mp-MedDsp-mp9-MBH300script10QA1MVE-id}').category.coding.where(system = 'http://snomed.info/sct' and code = '373784005' and display).exists()

description.value: Contains .medicationReference with either .reference or .identifier and .display

expression.value: Bundle.entry.resource.where($this is MedicationDispense).where(id = '${mp-MedDsp-mp9-MBH300script10QA1MVE-id}').medication.where($this is Reference).where((reference or identifier) and display).exists()

description.value: Contains .subject with either .reference or .identifier and .display

expression.value: Bundle.entry.resource.where($this is MedicationDispense).where(id = '${mp-MedDsp-mp9-MBH300script10QA1MVE-id}').subject.where((reference or identifier) and display).exists()

description.value: Contains .performer with .actor with either .reference or .identifier and .display

expression.value: Bundle.entry.resource.where($this is MedicationDispense).where(id = '${mp-MedDsp-mp9-MBH300script10QA1MVE-id}').performer.where(actor.where((reference or identifier) and display)).exists()

description.value: Contains .authorizingPrescription with either .reference or .identifier and .display

expression.value: Bundle.entry.resource.where($this is MedicationDispense).where(id = '${mp-MedDsp-mp9-MBH300script10QA1MVE-id}').authorizingPrescription.where((reference or identifier) and display).exists()

description.value: Contains .quantity with .extension with url 'http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/iso21090-PQ-translation' with .valueQuantity with .value '5' and .unit and .system 'urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.2.4.4.1.900.2' and .code '245' and .value '5' and .unit and .system 'http://unitsofmeasure.org' and .code '1'. This assert checks if all children exist (if applicable with their specific values) and if they are present within one element. Following asserts check if individual children exist to help you debug if this assert fails
